title: Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins guest hosting
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins guest hosting
description:
Doug and Ryan give their thoughts on the Lakers hiring Darvin Ham as their new head coach.  Doug describes the craziest story of the weekend, and Ryan weighs in on Tommy Pham slapping Joc Pederson over a text message/Fantasy Football incident.  NFL Analyst for CBS Sports and the NFL Network Charles Davis joins Doug and Ryan to talk about the high profile quarterbacks that have decided to miss OTA's, what the 49ers do with Deebo Samuel, and other major headlines around the NFL right now.  Plus, Doug and Ryan weigh in on protest of the national anthem by Giants' manager Gabe Kapler. 

#douggottliebshow 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
